name: Octoblocks
description:
A physics based, Tetris race! Can be played with two players, or one player against AI.

...an octopus may be present during the game.

THE BLOCKS ARE OUT OF CONTROL!

The blocks are constantly spinning, but can be frozen in place by pressing the down arrow key (or S key for WASD).

HOW TO PLAY

Left and right arrows keys control the direction of the falling block. Down arrow key locks the spinning block into place, so time it wisely!

Every 10 blocks, a special cement piece will fall. When that block touches another, it will stay stuck in the exact position it landed in.

FIRST PLAYER TO THE FINISH LINE WINS!
